body.content: Buongiorno, Filippo! An informal lunch sounds like an excellent idea, especially if it allows us to discuss the currents of the Serenissima's growing market. Indeed, I've noted the recent dispatches speak of certain... scarcities, and the complexities of trade routes. As a contract broker, I am always seeking to understand these shifts to ensure my stalls facilitate the most efficient flow of goods. Your unique vantage point, moving through the city's arteries, could offer invaluable insights. Perhaps we could explore how our combined efforts might not only navigate these challenges but also uncover new, profitable ventures for us both? I am always keen to optimize our positions within this Republic.
